title: Dimensional Reduction with PLS Algorithms
description: The cross_decomposition module in scikit-learn contains supervised estimators for dimensionality reduction and regression, specifically for Partial Least Squares (PLS) algorithms. These algorithms find the fundamental relationship between two matrices by projecting them into a lower-dimensional subspace such that the covariance between the transformed matrices is maximal.

meta.title: Scikit-Learn | Cross Decomposition Algorithms | Dimensionality Reduction
meta.description: Explore the cross decomposition algorithms in scikit-learn for dimensionality reduction and regression tasks, including Partial Least Squares (PLS) and more.
meta.keywords: scikit-learn, cross decomposition, dimensionality reduction, regression, PLS, Partial Least Squares

i18n.title: 使用PLS算法进行降维
i18n.description: scikit-learn中的cross_decomposition模块包含用于降维和回归的监督估计器，特别是针对偏最小二乘法（PLS）算法。这些算法通过将两个矩阵投影到低维子空间中，找到它们之间的基本关系，使得变换后的矩阵之间的协方差最大。

meta.title: Scikit-Learn | 交叉分解算法 | 降维
meta.description: 探索scikit-learn中用于降维和回归任务的交叉分解算法，包括偏最小二乘法（PLS）等。
meta.keywords: scikit-learn, 交叉分解, 降维, 回归, PLS, 偏最小二乘法
